entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:58 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fredericton Int'l Airport 09:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this morning then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
